actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Legislative Process.

official_title: To provide that the new franking requirements and procedures, as they pertain to the House of Representatives, be suspended pending the completion of a study and report thereon.

summary.text: Suspends new franking requirements and procedures under the Legislative Branch Appropriations Act, 1991, with respect to the House of Representatives, until completion and report of the study required by this Act. Restores all superseded laws, rules, and regulations regarding franked mail of the House to full force and effect. Directs the Speaker of the House to appoint a select committee to: (1) study the appropriateness of the new franking requirements and procedures as they pertain to the House; and (2) submit to the House a written report containing its findings and recommendations.

titles.title: To provide that the new franking requirements and procedures, as they pertain to the House of Representatives, be suspended pending the completion of a study and report thereon.
